Release Note:
What's Changed

PlaybackManager: use GLib.Once by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/732
Handle dropped folder by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/739
metainfo: Add translation field by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/740
Bump bilelmoussaoui/flatpak-github-actions from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/742
Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/741
Bump actions/checkout from 1 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/743
Update flatpak actions to new namespace by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/744
Update runtime to 7.2 by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/748
Bump flatpak/flatpak-github-actions from 5 to 6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/749
Allow to open directories directly by @aitor-gomila in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/747
Update metainfo for next release by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/751
MainWindow: use HeaderBars by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/753
MainWindow: Gtk.DropTarget: use drop instead on_drop by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/754
Release 7.1.0 by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/755

New Contributors

@dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/742

@leolost2605 made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/754

What's Changed

Use file basename instead of uri for the default audio object title. by @vjr in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/710
Skip invalid files instead of stopping playback. by @vjr in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/711
Enable the NEXT button if repeat mode is set to ALL or ONE. by @vjr in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/712

Metainfo: Use branding tag and screenshot caption by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/724
Metainfo improvements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/music/pull/728
